CustomField.description: Add the Contact's Household Account if the Service Delivery has the potential to benefit the entire household. For example, meals from a food bank. If the Service Delivery only benefits the individual Contact, leave this field blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Add the Contact's Household Account if the Service Delivery has the potential to benefit the entire household. For example, meals from a food bank. If the Service Delivery only benefits the individual Contact, leave this field blank.
CustomField.label: Household Account
